parameters: PLEASE TAKE A SEAT AT THE TABLE IF YOU WISH TO GAMBLE
AWAY YOUR SAVINGS.
WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW THE RULES?
Yes
No
Yes
THE OBJECTIVE IS TO OBTAIN A HAND OF PLAYING CARDS THAT
SUM UP TO 21, WITHOUT GOING OVER 21. ONCE ALL BETS ARE
PLACED, THE DEALER WILL DRAW A CARD, AND THEN DEAL TWO
CARDS TO EACH PLAYER.
THE PLAYER CAN CHOOSE TO EITHER HIT OR STAY. IF THE PLAYER
CHOOSES TO HIT, ANOTHER CARD WILL BE DRAWN FOR THEM. IF
THE DRAWN CARD CAUSES THEIR HAND TO SUM UP TO A NUMBER
OVER 21, THEIR HAND IS BUST AND THAT PLAYER LOSES.
IF A PLAYER CHOOSES TO STAY, THEY KEEP THEIR HAND AT THE
VALUE IT'S CURRENTLY AT. AFTER ALL PLAYER'S TURNS ARE OVER,
THE DEALER DRAWS CARDS FOR THEMSELF. THE DEALER MUST STAY
AT A VALUE GREATER OR EQUAL TO 16.
IF THE PLAYER'S HAND IS A GREATER VALUE THAN THE DEALER'S
HAND, OR IF THE DEALER BUSTS, THE PLAYER WINS. THE PLAYER
WINS TWICE THE AMOUNT THAT THEY BET. ELSE IF THE PLAYER
BUSTS OR THE DEALER HAS A GREATER HAND, THEY WIN NOTHING.
CARD VALUES:
NUMBERED CARDS: FACE VALUE
KINGS, QUEENS, AND JACKS: 10
ACES: 11 OR 1
No
PLEASE TAKE A SEAT AT THE TABLE IF YOU WISH TO GAMBLE
AWAY YOUR SAVINGS.
WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW THE RULES?
Yes
No
Yes
WITH THIS ROULETTE WHEEL, YOU CAN BET ON A NUMBER THAT YOU
THINK THE BALL WILL STOP ON. YOU CAN BET ON ONE NUMBER AT
A TIME. YOU CAN ALSO BET ON WHETHER THE NUMBER THE BALL
STOPS ON WILL BE ODD OR EVEN.
IF YOU WISH TO BET ON A DIFFERENT NUMBER BEFORE THE WHEEL
IS SPUN, YOUR OLD NUMBER WILL BE REPLACED WITH YOUR NEW
NUMBER. THIS ALSO APPLIES TO YOUR ODD AND EVEN BET.
PAYOUTS:
CORRECT NUMBER GUESS: 10 TIMES BET
CORRECT ODD OR EVEN GUESS: 2 TIMES BET
No

I'm getting bored of all these lame casino games, bro.\.
Do you wanna play some Uno?
Oh,\. I don't have Uno. Sorry.
You don't have Uno?\. EVERYONE has Uno, idiot.\. It
comes free with every YBOY.
I didn't get it.\. I have the oldest YBOY known to man!
No you don't!\. I got mine on day one!
Well MINE didn't have it!
YOU HAVE UNO, you liar!
I DON'T HAVE IT!
YOU HAVE UNOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!
I DON'T HAVE UNO!\^
JUST GO TO THE STORE!\^
I DON'T HAVE TWO!\^
AND YOU'LL BE ABLE TO GET IT FOR FREE!\^
I DON'T HAVE THREE, FOUR, OR FIVE!\^
IT'S A STUPID CARD GAME!\^
I DON'T HAVE SIX, SEVEN, OR EIGHT!\^
THEY DON'T EVEN CHARGE PEOPLE FOR IT!\^
I DON'T HAVE NINE, TEN, ELEVEN-\^
YOU DON'T KNOW A SINGLE SOLITARY THING!\!
IT'S UNO!\. IT'S FREE!!!

I'm feeling lucky today!\! Do you feel lucky?\.
Well?\. Do ya, punk?
Gambling has forever ruined my life!\. But if my life is
forever ruined, might as well make the most of it by
gambling some more.
Deal the cards again,\. robot dude!\.
I've got you this time!
The system is rigged.
I'm dying!\. My skin's going grey and my hair is
turning green!\. Is this the end for me?\!
Oh wait\..\..\..this is what I normally look like.
I got a blood test.\. Turns out I'm a vampire!\.
What do you know?

casino is safe!\. Automation is the future whether
you like it or not!
Manmade horrors beyond mortal comprehension are all the
rage these days.
